sentences.sContent: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.sCn: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.sContent: ...Harvard has a special opportunity to convey its respect for science not only through its research and teaching programs but also in its public affirmation of evidence-based inquiry...
...What message does the author try to convey about goal-setting...
